text: Approval for the immulite anti-hbc and immulite 2000 anti-hbc.  These devices are indicated for:  immulite. anti-hbc: immulite anti-hbc is a solid -phase chemiluminescent enzyme immunoassay designed for use on the immulite automated immunoassay analyzer for the qualitative detection of total antibodies against hepatitis  b core antigen (anti-hbc) in human serum or plasma (edta, heparinized, citrate).  It is intended for in vitro diagnostic use for the laboratory diagnosis of ongoing or previous hepatitis b virus infection.  Immulite. 2000 anti-hbc: immulite 2000 anti-hbc is a solid-phase chemiluminescent enzyme immunoassay designed for use on the immulite 2000 automated immunoassay analyzer for the qualitative detection of total antibodies against hepatitis b core antigen (anti-hbc) in human serum or plasma (edta, heparinized, citrate).  It is intended for in vitro diagnostic use for the laboratory diagnosis of ongoing or previous hepatitis b virus infection .
